verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rejoice in the Lord always newline and again I say Rejoice newline and again I say, and again I say.. newline Rejoice...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Come bless the Lord newline Come bless the Lord newline Draw near to worship Christ the Lord newline and bless his name newline his holy name newline declare that he is good

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: oh that men would praise him newline oh that men would praise his name..
